name: Daily Designer Wise Sample Sent Report
query:
SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY swo.designer ORDER BY swo.requested_time) AS "SL:Int",
    swo.designer AS "Designer Name:Link/Employee",
    swo.requested_time AS "Requisition Date:Date",
    swo.buyer AS "Buyer:Link/Customer",
    swo.style AS "Style:Data",
    swo.gauge AS "GG:Data",
    swo.sample_type AS "Sample Type:Select",
    srq.quantity AS "Qty:Float",
    swo.handover_date AS "Handover Date:Date",
    swo.sample_submission_deadline AS "Sample Submission Deadline:Date",
    swo.sample_category AS "Sample Category:Select",
    DATEDIFF(swo.sample_submission_deadline, swo.requested_time) AS "Lead Time:Data",
    swo.remarks AS "Remarks:Data"
FROM
    `tabSample Work Order` swo
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSample Request Quantity` srq ON srq.parent = swo.name
WHERE
    swo.docstatus IN (0,1)
ORDER BY
    swo.designer ASC, swo.requested_time ASC;
report_name: Daily Designer Wise Sample Sent Report
